featured.text: this oil-absorbing feature might not always be so great for our hygiene, it can be great for the environment.
The hair and fur are made into mats and brooms and sent to 24 waters to absorb the oil.

definition.zh_def: 吸收，接受或吸引某物進入自身。
definition.en_def: To take in or soak up a substance, or to fully understand or assimilate information.
definition.example: Plants absorb sunlight to produce energy.
